project.name: Custom Core Trace

property.name: dvt.activity.description
property.value: Display Core Trace data which the target application configured for. Data can be analyzed using the Analyze button in the Trace Viewer.

project.dvt.property:
version=1.0.0 dvt.activity.priority = 90
dataproviders=Trace Trace.name=Trace Viewer Trace.analyzer=None
